titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
Jan. 1. M. Call on Jo G
&
Nicholson
: Pavillion, w. M J, H & M Hopwood, F, C, M, J & W; adv. T T & Flather
.

2. Tu. Write to Woodcock . Jacob calls: call on Jo G
&
Surr
: dine at Bonnycastle’s , w. T T .

3. W.
J White calls: call on Perry
&
Miles
.

4. Th. Write to Berry . Call on Miles
&
J Johnson
: Dawe calls: Wolcot, L Eastwick, Clennels, 3 Tabarts & T T sup.

5. F. Call on Morton (S R)
,
Lancaster
&
Christian
: Pilchers dine: dine at St Paul’s, w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, Lockhart & J J; adv. Hewlet
: Bonnycastle calls.

6. Sa. Call on Theobald
,
Middleton
,
J Robinson
,
Gillet
,
Constable
n ,
Creed
&
Nicholson
: Hazlit at tea: Dawe call n . & Lawrence .

Su. Jan. 7. Crevier, on Ap. Tyan., pp. 98. N G & S P dine; adv. Pilcher
: Dawe calls.
8. M. Rochester, çala.

9. Tu. St Phale, p. 70. Chamberlaine & Hazlitt call: call on M Lamb
: T T sups.
10. W. Call on Lancaster (£108..6.--) : S P & L Ht call [write to Nicholson ]: O Fenwk calls.

11. Th.
L Ht (accounts) , Mills & O Fenwick call: call on Miles
.

12. F. Write to Nicholson & Fenwick . Pilchers dine: call on
Bensley
: N G calls: T T sups.
13. Sa. Orlando, B. I : St Phale, p. 168. T T calls & Pilchers, ppc .
Jan. 14. Su. Write to M Walsh. Life of Ht, çala: Orlando, B. II. Jo & N G , Hazlit & M Lamb call.
15. M. Life of Ht, fin. Hazlit calls.
16. Tu. Write to M Walsh . Chamberlaine , T T & J White call. Read C Ml pamphlet.
17. W. Write to Southworth & J Taylor . Wilkie , Hilton , Mills & M Lamb call: Louisa Ht dines & sleeps .

18. Th.
C Lawrence & M call : J, H & M Hopwood, 3 Humes, 2 Boinvilles, L Ht & L Smith dine; adv. 2 Colliers & Hume
. Nairs, çala. Write to L Ht .

19. F. Write to Knott & Lloyd , Upham , Peeling , Meyler , Mozley & Booth : Hilton , T T , L Ht & M call n : call on Lambert
,
mrs Ridgway
&
Place
: dine at St P’s, w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Dennis, Jas Moore, Knowles & J J .

20. Sa.
Lindsay & mrs Ravizzotti call: call on
Lewis
,
Townsend
, &
Miles ; adv. Johnsons
.
Jan. 21. Su. Write to Woodcock . Dine at Collier’s , w. 2 Hts, 3 Airys, Norris, Tomlins, Andrews & M J .

22. M.
C Lawrence calls: T T sups; adv. N G
.

23. Tu. Ht, revise. Smart calls: call on Ramsbottom
,
Grosvenor
,
Tipper
&
Surr
: sup at Lamb’s
. Hilton calls. Parliament meets
Hoppner dies .

24. W. Ht, revise. Newman & Mullet junr call: call on Longdil
&
Harris
. Write to Brodie , Deck , Sheppard , Barrat & Saffory .
25. Th. Ht, revise. M calls: T T sups. Jo G calls.
26. F. Ht, revise. Chamberlaine , & mes Hume & Thomson call: T T sups. Division of Walcheren, 195 to 186 .

27. Sa. 1806, çala. Guildhall, Didier; adv. Letterman
.
Jan. 28. Su. 1806, çala. Write to Nicholson & Crombie . Tea Boinville’s , w. Newtons, Voisy, T T, M J, F & C .

29. M. 1806, çala. Call on
Theobald
&
Ward ; adv. Cooper
: T T & Flather sup.
30. Tu. 1806, çala. Hume & W L White call: T T sups.

31. W. 1806, p. 4/2. C Smith calls: call on Mills
&
Miles
.

Feb. 1. Th.
J Johnson twice, Miller & J Richter call: T T sups.
2. F. 1806, p. 4. Tipper & Macmillan call: dine at Johnson’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastles 2, Damiani, Dr Knighton & J J .

3. Sa. 1806, p. 5. Write to Nicholson & Miles . Theatre, City Madam; adv. Surr
: T T sups.
Feb. 4. Su. City Madam: Unnatural Combat, acts 1 & 2. Miles & J Johnson call: T T calls: L Ht & Lamb at tea.

5. M. Call on Place
,
Miles
,
Mills
,
Bensley
&
Bonsor
: M calls: T T dines; adv. Waller
:
theatre, w. M J & T T; City Madam .
6. Tu. Picture, acts 1 & 2. L Ht & B M & T T call: Place au soir. Bensley calls.

7. W. Write to M Walsh (195). Call on Mills
,
Gravel
,
Raine
,
Hurst (£)
&
Taylor
: L Ht dines; adv. M
.

8. Th. Write to Hazlit . Call on Carpenter
: meet Perry : T T & Evans at tea: theatre, Free Knts; adv. Boaden & Listons
: Hopwood sups.

9. F. Call on Miles (w. Place),
Bonsor
,
Tabart
n &
Longdil
: T T sups.

10. Sa. Call on Place
,
Tabart
,
Carpenter
, &
Goddard
&
Miller
: mrs Clennel calls: T T dines.

Feb. 11. Su. Sandys, çala. Waller & T T dine; adv. H Robinson & Girle
.
12. M. Calculations for Longmans . Picture, fin.

13. Tu. Guardian, acts 1 & 2. Miles & Mills call: meet L Ht , M Lamb & G Dawe : call on G M C (adv. E Reynolds ),
Lambert
, & (w. T T) on Place
.

14. W. Call on Longdil
, &, w. T T, on Lambert
&
Place (execute).

15. Th. Call on Tipper
, Wilmot & Hill , &
Miles
: mrs Topping dines; adv. T T
: 2 Hopwoods call. (deliver).

16. F. Call on Theobald
: Girle , Macmillan & Jas Moore call:
T T sups, talk of love & fidelity .

17. Sa. Call on Creed
,
Dibbin
,
Curtis
,
Theobald
&
Miles
.
Feb. 18. Su. 1806, p. 6. Unnatural Combat, fin. Macmillan calls: H Boinville, mrs Newton, 4 Colliers, H Robinson, Voisy, T T & H Hopwood, evening.

19. M. 1806, 1 page. Call on Law
&
Harris
: Lambs sup.

20. Tu. 1806, 6 lines. Write to Hazlit .
Theatre, 1/2 Free Knights, & Budget of Blunders, w. M Lamb, T T, M J & 4
.

21. W. 1806, 1/2 page. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Friend, & Biron, çala: Beggar’s Bush, act 1. Macreery , Miles & Sidney call: theatre, Bn of Brs .
22. Th. Beggar’s Bush, act 2: Savage of Aveyron, pp. 21. Henry & C Hopwood dine.

23. F.
Hazlit calls: dine at
Johnson , w. Bonnycastle, 2 Gascoynes & Hunt : Hazlit sups. Write to Franklin , Baker & Booth . Liston calls na .

24. Sa.
Hazlit , T Darton na & Voycy call.
Feb. 25. Su. Antonio & Mellida. T T calls.
26. M. Antonio’s Revenge, acts 1 & 2. T T n , N G & Fenwick call.
27. Tu. Venus & Adonis. Fk , Newton & T T call: theatre, Hypocrite.

28. W. Ciris & Ceres, çala. Tarquin & Lucrece. Call on G M C (adv. mrs Wilcocke ), &, w. M J, on mrs Topping
&
Hopwood
: H Robinson calls.
Mar. 1. Th. Pantheon, 3 pp. Mulready , & Macmillan call: call on Miles, £1 //

2. F. 2/5 Honest Whore. Call on Goddard
: T T sups.
3. Sa. Write to Miller, on A B Drama . Witch.
Mar. 4. Su. White Devil, act 1. Mulready dines.

5. M. Malfy, acts 1 & 2.
T T calls, from Northcote , £10 : M Lamb calls.
6. Tu. Malfy, fin: Four P.’s. L Ht dines: T T & H Robinson sup. Gold calls.
7. W. Tu Quoque, act 1. Lamb calls: T T sups.

8. Th. Call on G M C ; adv. E Reynolds
.
9. F. Inforced Marriage. Dine at St Paul’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Chenevix, Edgworth & Joyce : Lockhart calls: T T sups.

10. Sa.
J White calls: call on Griffith, apothecary
, &
Rouffigny
.
Mar. 11. Su. Hog, acts 1 & 2: American on France, p. 124.

12. M. Hog, fin. Tipper & M Lamb call: dine at
J White’s , w. Faulder, D Stewart & Miles .

13. Tu. 1/2 Merry Devil. R Taylor calls: call on Longdil
: theatre, Maniac: Girle sups.

14. W. Write to Woodcock . Jo G , R & A Taylor call:
T T sups.

15. Th. Write to Hazlit & Wrangham . Hollis calls: sup at
Lamb’s , w. M J . Call on E Reynolds ; adv. mrs Harris (Catalani) : Phillips calls n .

16. F. Pantheon, Index, correct. Call on
Longdill
: Wilson of York calls.

17. Sa. Return from Pernassus. Call on
G M C
na (adv. miss Wilcocke ) &
Reynolds ; adv. mrs Holman
: T T calls: H Robinson sups.

Mar. 18. Su. Eliz. Poots, çala. Walk w. T T (talk of morals); T T sups; adv. mrs & miss Harwd
.
19. M. Pantheon, 2 pp (Peleus). Mrs Cecil Smth at tea.

20. Tu. Call on Cooper, O S S H
n &
Pearsal
: mrs & miss Boinville, & 2 Newtons at tea. Write to M Chronicle .

21. W. Pantheon, 3 pp (Ceyx). Requests, v. Darton, w. T T
: T T dines; adv. Flather
: Wilcockes call n .
G M Cooper dies .

22. Th. Call on Evans
,
Ant. Robinson
&
Cooper
: meet Phillips & Surr : call on Wilson, York
n : Voycey calls: call on Miller
&
Seabrook
.

23. F. Write on Smithfield, 4 pp:
Wilson (York)
& Macmillan calls: call on Ward
,
Solly
&
Vaughan
&
Surr
: dine at Johnson’s , w. Davy, Mullet, Jas Moore, Maddocks, Knowles & Edgworth junr
: S Wilcocke, & sister n
& N G call. meet Jo G
.

24. Sa. Advertisements. Woodard, p. 84. Call on W Jacob
: Mulready calls, & Wilcockes, mr & mrs , & Lockhart .

Mar. 25. Su. Write to M Walsh . Funeral, G M C, w. S & G Wilcocke; adv. Jo & N G, & 4 children
: call on E Reynolds
&
Domville (for C Ft
).
26. M. Smitfield, p. 5. Horrocks & Seabrook & T T (marriage) call: Bannister’s Budget.
27. Tu. Pantheon, Index. Lambs, Listons, & H Robinson sup.

28. W. Theocritus, çala. J Johnson, H, W & P Hopwood dine; adv. mrs Topping, L Ht, V, miss Pashley & Jas Hopwood
.

29. Th. Theocritus, Hylas; & Heracliscus, 34. Deck calls & Macmillan : T T at tea:
theatre, How to Teaze, w. M J
.

30. F.
Linnel, mrs Mulready, Voycey & Turner sup: call on Lamb
: C Lawrence , Seabrook & Horwood call:
Walcheren approved, 253 to 232.
31. Sa. Smithfield, 10 pp. Macmillan calls: theatre, How to Teaze; adv. Surr ( Sullivan) : H Robinson après souper . mrs Clennel dines. Grattan calls.
Apr. 1. Su. Jeronymo. Horwood & Seabrook call.
2. M. Jeronymo, Part II, acts 1 & 2. Dine at Tipper’s , Cumberland, Bligh, Dr & mr Davis, H Robinson, Crowe & J Richter . Write to Grattan & R Sharp .

3. Tu. Write to Woodcock . Jeronymo, act 3. Call on
M Lamb ; adv. S Hazlit
: T T sups.

4. W. Smithfield, for M P, 4 pp. Call on Russel
,
C House
, &
Taylor
. Write to Upham , Mozley , Sheppard , Barrat , Brodie & Saffory .

5. Th. Call on Stamp-Office ,
Tate
, & Wilmot & Hill : meet L Ht : theatre, W G, Henry IV, & Paul & V; adv. 4 Humes
. meet Place . Committal of Burdet voted, 189 to 152.
6. F. Abridge Grammar. Andronicus, acts 1 & 2. R Taylor calls: T T sups.

7. Sa.
Clerk from Tilson : Grattan , Barry n & J White call: call on Tilson
&
Biggs
n : walk to Piccadilly , w T T; adv. Newtons
.

Apr. 8. Su. Skelton, çala. Seabrook & T T call: wlk to Piccadilly, w. M J
: Waller & H Robinson sup. meet Miller bookseller & Collier junr
.

9. M. Write to Woodcock . Call, w. T T, on Biggs
,
Longdil
&
Place
: S Hazlit calls: T T sups.
Burdet to the Tower .

10. Tu. Abridge Grammar. Write to Taylor, Norwich
: Curran dines; adv. H Robinson & T T
.
11. W. Grammar, çala. Miles & Bensley call.

12. Th. Grammar, çala. Curran calls: C C on Tate : T T sups; adv. N G
.

13. F. Grammar, çala. Dine at St Paul’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Wakefield, Edgworth, maj. Moore, Joyce & Knowles; adv. R Taylor
.

14. Sa.
Grattan & Curran breakfast: call on Cumberland
,
Curran
n ,
Dawe
,
Flaxman
n &
Reynolds (adv. R R ): sup at Lamb’s , w. M J; adv. M Burney, S & J Hazlit
: meet Lauderd :
Apr. 15. Su. Grammar, çala. T T dines: tea Newton’s , w. 5 Lambs, 3 Boinvilles, Souse, Lawrence, T T & M J .
16. M. Grammar, çala. Lockhart & N G call: T T sups.

17. Tu. Meet Perry & Jo G : Smart at tea: call on
T T , w. M J : Robinson sups. Dawe calls.

18. W. Grammar, çala. Call on J White
,
Mathews
n &
Macmillan
: Curran, Cumberland, Wolcot, Bligh & T T dine.

19. Th. Call on Flaxman ( S H), &
Curran ; adv. Hutchins, Waring & dr Wright
:
Withers (Holt) calls n & Jo G : Curran dines; adv. T T
.

20. F.
Withers calls: walk, w. T T, to Dulwich College, Allen & Smith, librarian ; dine; returning, call on
Waldron , Camberwel
.
21. Sa. Skelton, çala. Jo & N G call: T T sups.
Apr. 22. Su. Skelton, çala. M Hopwood dines.
23. M. Grammar, Analysis, çala. S Hazlit sups.

24. Tu. Grammar, Analysis, çala. Curran dines:
theatre, w. do , Macbeth; adv. Boaden
: Bedford, midshipman, w. do
.
25. W. Grammar, çala. Cumberland n & Manning call.
26. Th. Grammar, çala. Bouge of Courte. Call on Lane , w. T T : Girle sups. Chamberlaine calls.

27. F. Grammar, çala. Curran calls; adv. mrs Boinville
: 3 Boinvilles, 2 Hopwood, Ford & Eastwick dine; adv. T T & Jas Hopwood
: meet Lambs .

28. Sa. Grammar, çala. Curran calls:
theatre, w. M J & J, Gamester, & Who Wins .
Apr. 29. Su. Grammar, pp. 3. Newton & Voycy call. Crown of Lawrell.

30. M. Grammar, çala. Barry calls: Exhibition, w. Curran; adv. Perrys; Boaden , Liston , Dawes , H Richter , Flather & T T
.

May 1. Tu. Grammar, çala. Smart calls: call on R Taylor
: Curran sups.

2. W. Grammar, çala. Write to M Walsh . Call on Bensley
: Robinson & T T sup. Clennel at tea.

3. Th. Grammar, çala. Miles & Smart & Curran call: call on Surr ; adv. Phillips
. meet B Mercier & Place .

4. F. England, revise. Write to P H G .
Curran dines, ppc .

5. Sa. Write to Withers, Holt
. Call on Christian (Hope):
theatre, w. C C, Henry 8, & Waterman .

May 6. Su. Write to Withers, Holt
. Trip to Scarborough. T T sups.

7. M. Grammar, revise. Call on Hope
,
D C , w. Jo G &
T T
: Col. White & Hilton call na .

8. Tu. Guevara, çala. Cumberland calls:
D C w. T T : write to Carlisle : call on Stevenson
.

9. W. Grammar, çala. Write to Withers, Holt
. Guevara, p. 10. R & A Curran call: T T sups.

10. Th. Grammar, çala. Write to Woodcock . Call on Surr
&
Wilson
: meet Hill : Robinson sups. Stevenson & mrs Topping call.
11. F. Quarles, çala. Dine at St. Paul’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, Jas Moore & Blanco .
12. Sa. G Fletcher, çala. Sykes calls.

May 13. Su. Grammar, çala. Jo & N G & T T call: call on
Waldron
.

14. M. Grammar, çala. Call on Curtis
. Write to Mozley & Withers, w. administrations .
15. Tu. Grammar, çala. 2 Sykes’s, N G & T T dine: meet H Robinson .

16. W. Grammar, çala. Smart calls: call on B Montagu
: T T sups.
17. Th. Grammar, çala. Miles & Stevenson call.
18. F. Grammar, çala. Tu Quoque.

19. Sa. Write to Withers & P H G . Call on Creed
: Moore (W M) & T T call: T T & Flather sup. Jo G calls.
May 20. Su. Grammar, 1 1/2 pp. Orlando, B. I, II.
21. M. Grammar, çala. Smarts call.
22. Tu. Grammar, çala. Od. I, 155. Waldron calls: T T sups. (see May 4, 1809)
23. W. Write to H Rogers & Miles . Arcadia, p. 12.
24. Th. Grammar, çala. Lambs sup.

25. F. Grammar, çala. Ariosto, st. 12. Anderson calls: call on
Surr
, &, w. T T, on B Montagu
.
26. Sa. Grammar, çala. Od. 305. Jervis calls: H Robinson sups.

May 27. Su. England, Hindoo, 20 lines. Od. 444. Surr calls: dine at
Hume’s , w. M J, C, J, capt. Kemp & mrs Thomson; adv. Masters
. Kensington Gardens : call on mrs Mulready
.

28. M. Grammar, çala. Od. II, 79. Macmillan calls: theatre, K John, acts 1, 2, 3: T T sups. call on
Taylor ; adv. Edward
: meet B Montagu
29. Tu. England, çala. Write to Hazlit . Mrs Fenwick & O F call, & Anderson na .

30. W. Grammar, çala. W Letter to Huntingdon, Amn
. Od. 145. Anderson & 2 Fks at tea; adv. T T
.

31. Th. Grammar, çala. Od. 228. Call on Surr
,
Macmillan
,
Hume
&
Creed
: Stevenson & M Jones call: T T sups.

June 1. F. Grammar, çala. Od. 302. Call on Phillips
&
Surr
: T T at tea. adv. Atkinson & Granville Sharp .
2. Sa. Grammar, çala. P Hoare , Jervis & Warwick call.
June 3. Su. Grammar, çala.

4. M. Grammar, çala. Write to Hazlit & Upham . White & E F call: T T at tea: Exhibition, w. M J & H Boinville
: H Boinville sups.
Windham dies

5. Tu. Engd, 1 page. Call on Lewis
,
Surr
, &
Phillips
n : meet H Rogers & Creed : rev. Evans calls.

6. W. Preface to Grammar, 3 pp. Call on Hill
&
Phillips
: mrs Clennel dines: T T sups.

7. Th. Call, w. M J, on D. of Cumbd
&
miss Curran
n : call on Morgan
&
Phillips
. Family Legend, acts 1 & 2. Robinson sups: Pitchford calls.

8. F. Preface to Grammar, p. 4, 5. Call on Evans
: A Curran calls: dine at Johnson , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, Mullet, Evans, Jas Moore, capt. Turlip, White, Edgworth jr & Miles jr
.

9. Sa. Grammar, çala. Write to L Knapp . Call on Smirke , 3 times ,
Colburn
, &
Cumberland
n : T T sups.
June 10. Su. North, çala. A Curran dines.
11. M. Write to M Walsh . E Fk & Pitchford call: T T sups. Family Legend, fin. Write to Phillips on Feb. 15 .

12. Tu. Write to Withers . Call on J Robinson
,
Letterman
,
Smirke
&
Major
: meet Buchan : Phillips & Surr call n : write to Huntington, Schenectady
.

13. W. Defensio, p. 6. Miles , Kyd & another call: call on Jo G
,
Ballachey
&
Sheldon
: T T & Voycy call.

24 . Th.
Write to Carlisle & L Knapp : call on Ballachey
: R & E Taylor call.
15. F. North, Gracchi. T T calls: Anderson at tea.

16. Sa.
Jas Smith calls.
June 17. Su. Grammar, revise. Jas & Peter & A Smith dine. Stevenson calls, & N G .

18. M. Grammar, çala. Jas Smith & Peter Smth call: H Robinson & T T sup; adv. Patrickson
: call on Ballachey ; adv. Jo G
.

19. Tu. Grammar, çala. Write to Creed . T T calls: call, w. him on M
n ,
L Ht
, &
Keir
n .

20. W. Grammar, çala. M calls: T T sups.
Prorogation

21. Th. Grammar, çala. Daly , Rexworthy , Tracy, &c. call: Smith at tea; adv. T T
: call on Liston , w. M J & 7; adv. Smith, Lambs, Laburns, miss Tyrer & miss Liston
. Call on Hume
.

22. F. Grammar, çala. Kingston &c call: Miles , mrs Hume & 2 , mrs Thomson & N G call: call on
Ballachey
n &
N G
: 3 Smiths at tea.

23. Sa. Call on Ballachey
,
Tabart n (Guildhall ; adv. Miles, Letterman, Lackington, Harris, &c),
Jo G
n &
Husband
: Dell , Newton , & A Curran , & T T call. Lovett, p. 82.
June 24. Su. Grammar, çala. Lovett, p. 174, fin. N G & Smith call: Westminster Abbey.

25. M. Grammar, fin. Jas & P Smith call:
Patrickson sups.

26. Tu. Call on Jo G
:
Miles calls (£300) : mrs Topping dines; adv. T T
: Hopwood & H Robinson sup.

27. W.
Rice calls: T T, P Smith & N G sup.
28. Th. Raleigh, çala.

29. F. Raleigh, çala.
Guildhall (Tabart ); adv. Miles, Harris, Letterman, Lackington, Orme, Phipps, &c : T T calls.

30. Sa. Call on Phillips
,
Miles
,
Evans
,
Creed
&
Jo G
: H Boinville calls: C B dines. Quixote, p. 42.
July 1. Su. Coach, w. H Boinville, Whitaker, &c, bookkeeper : Bishopsgate Heath; adv. 2 Voisys, 3 Lambs & T T . Write to M J . sleep.
2. M. Quixote, p. 81. Walk to Cumberland Lodge & Old Windsor, w. Newtons .
3. Tu. Quixote, p. 98. Windsor, the king, the Terrace, &c: rain.
4. W. Quixote, p. 136. See miss Robinson’s & Gawler’s Cottages.
5. Th. Quixote, p. 142. Coach, w. H B, F V, &c. tea Skinner Street.
6. F. Write to J Johnson , Dunn & Boinville . Daly , Berry , & Smith , & Girle call: T T & Flather call sup.
7. Sa. Write to A Davison . Quixote, p. 152. Lamb calls.
July 8. Su. Letter to P Hoare, p. 3. Bacon, çala. Smith dines.

9. M. Bacon’s Letters, pp. 192. Col. White , Calcot & T T call: call, w. M J, on Dell
: T T & Patrickson sup.
10. Tu. Write to P Hoare . Phipps , Berry na , McMillan , Williams , Clough & Martin call: T T & Patrickson sup.

11. W. Quixote, p. 182. Berry n , Boinville & M n call: call on Orme
,
Crosby jr
,
Law
,
Sherwood
, Gale & Curtis , &
Cradock
,
J White
, &
Waldron
.

12. Th. Gusman & Donne, çala.
Fk calls & Gold : Smith at tea: T T sups; adv. Patrickson
.

13. F. Write to Berry . Call on J Robinson
,
Harris
,
Letterman
,
rev. J Russel
, &
Faulder
: Patrickson calls.
14. Sa. Write to Creed . Letter from P Hoare . Bacon’s Essays, p. 31: Quixote, p. 200.

July 15. Su. Bacon, p. 53: Quixote, p. 218.
Patrickson & H Hopwood dine: Stevenson calls.

16. M. Write to Newton . Call on Raine
. Smith at tea. Quixote, p. 237. M calls (Phillips).

17. Tu. Quixote, p. 264. Call on Platt
: Patrickson & Kerr call.

18. W. Write to Newton . Lazarillo, p. 60. Chancery Lane, w. Orme, Letterman, Lackington, Harris & J Rivington : call on Gotobed
: meet Joyce .

19. Th. Lazarillo, p. 165, fin.
Graham of Berwk
, Patrickson & M call: E Fk sups. European Settlements, p. 24.
20. F. Eur. Settlements, p. 54: Quixote, Vol. II, p. 18. M , Borman , Dawbarn, &c. call.

21. Sa. Write to Withers . Eur. Settlements, p. 124. M calls, from Creed
: call on Phillips
n ,
Letterman
&
R Hunter
: Patrickson & Dawbarn call.
July 22. Su. Eur. Settlements, p. 200: Guevara, çala. Jo & N G call: T T, Patrickson & Girle sup.

23. M. Quixote, p. 31. Borman calls: call on Bagwell
,
Anthony
,
Phillips
&
Raine
: Patrickson , T T & Dawburn call.

24. Tu. Call on Creed
,
N G
,
Gold
&
Phillips ; adv. Surr
.

25. W. On Spanish Poetry, pp. 322. M calls, fr. Creed
: write to Newton & Phillips : T T sups. Curtis (bookseller) & Dawburn call, & R Taylor .
26. Th. Quixote, p. 120. Three Dawburns , Withers , & M call: T T & Patrickson sup. Newton calls.

27. F. Call on Raine
: dine at St Paul’s, w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, capt. Hunter, Laing & two : Patrickson calls, Dawburn sr
& M : Smth sups.

28. Sa. Write to Booth, Norwich
. Waldron & Macmillan call: meet Phillips , & B Montagu .
July 29. Su. North, Cato sr . M Hopwood dines: T T sups.

30. M. Call on J Robinson
&
T T
: T T & Patrickson sup. Write to Merridew , Saffory , Meyler , Sands , Charnley & Marshal .

31. Tu.
Guildhall (Tabart); adv. Phipps, Lackington, Rivington, Harris, Miles & Letterman
: Curtis st[a?]t[r?] : S M at tea. Letter to S E . E F calls.

Aug. 1. W. Quixote, p. 180. Write to Upham , & Newton . Call on Russel
: T T & Patrickson sup: Chater calls, & mrs Topping .

2. Th. Quixote, p. 242. Call on Raine
: M J for Bishopsgate, w. F .

3. F. Write to M J . Quixote, p. 288. Call on Ellis
,
B M
m , &
B Montagu
: T T sups.

4. Sa. Write to M J ; Arnot , Baker , Deck , Brodie , Sheppard & Robins . Call on Lackington
&
mrs Montagu
: theatre, High Life in the City: Lockhart calls: T T sups.

Aug. 5. Su. Quixote, Vol. III, p. 29. Dine at
Hume , w. T T & C C; adv. mrs Thomson
: T T , P P & Voisy sup; invité Flather
: Lambs calln .

6. M. Write to Berry . T T & Flather call: V Ht breakfasts: A Boinville calls: call on E Reynolds
: meet Perry : M J & F from Bishopsgate : T T sups.
7. Tu. Quixote, p. 58. Lamb & T T call: E Fk sups.

8. W. Quixote, p. 74. Call on Smirke
: T T, P P & R Taylor sup.

9. Th. Advancemt of Learning, p. 42. A & C Boinville dine:
P Murphy calls: call on
Lamb , w. M J, M & J : Robinson sups.

10. F. Bradley v. Kerr: P P calls: call on T T
: do sups.

11. Sa.
Mullet calls on M J : Guildhall; Cullen, Tabart, Phipps, Hannam, White, Letterman & Bensley :
theatre, w. M J & T T, Doubtful Son, & Bombastes .
Aug. 12. Su. Advancemt, p. 118. Smith calls.

13. M. Advancemt p. 128: Quixote, p. 107. Call on mrs Montagu
n : Kerr & Smith of Sun. Rev. call: call on E Fk
: A Curran calls.

14. Tu.
Chater calls: call of Phillips
: dine at Hume’s , w. M J, M, J, W & T T . Quixote, p. 125.

15. W. Letter to Wedgwood . Call on mrs Montagu ; adv. mrs Speed
: Macmillan & Smith, S R, call: Fks sup.
16. Th. Advancemt, p. 152: Quixote, p. 147. T T & P P sup.
17. F. Advancemt p. 197. Call, w. T T, at A Curran’s Picture : P P calls: E Fk sups. J Davis calls n .

18. Sa. Advancemt p. 234: Quixote, p. 167. Call on Montagu
: T T, Flather & Jas Smith sup. meet H Robinson .

Su. Aug. 19. Simmons, Milton, çala. Call, w. Jo G, on Chase
: Jo G dines. Greece, çala.

M. 20. Examination of sir R P; adv. Cullen, Rivington, Bensley, Letterman, Bingham, Hannam, Phipps, White & Watkinson
: T T & Lamb sup: Flather calls.

21. Tu.
Guildhall; Tabart, Cullen, Phipps, Hannam, Bingham, Parker, White, Harris, Rivington, Letterman & Kirkman; adv. Waldron
: R Taylor & H Boinville call: meet Montagu . Call on Chater
22. W. Quixote, p. 209. Smith at tea: T T & Lb call.

23. Th. Camden, Annals, çala: Quixote, p. 234. Call on Lewis
,
Cullen
&
Orme
: Flathers & Lamb call: T T sups.

24. F. Camden, p. 5: Quixote, p. 258. Call on Miles
&
Letterman
: P P sups.

25. Sa. Write to Wedgwood . Quixote, p. 288. Flather, senr , calls: call on Tuthill
: T T sups.
Aug. 26. Su. Greece, çala: Quixote, Vol. IV, p. 21. M calls: J Johnson dines.
27. M. Greece, çala. Quixote, p. 45: Leicester’s Commonwealth, p. 23. Orme & Phipps call: meet Lamb : Tuthill calls: Flather, E F & T T sup.

28. Tu. Leicester, p. 44: Quixote, 57: Camden, çala. T T calls, & mrs Topping : call on Creed
.
29. W. Greece, p. 53/2-56. Leicester, p. 100. Meet W Wilson : Lockhart calls: Hopwood & son sup.
30. Th. Greece, p. 59/2. Leicester, p. 140. Aldis calls: tea Hampstead, w. E Fk, M J & 5 .
31. F. Greece, p. 63. T T & H Robinson sup: N G calls.
Sep. 1. Sa. Greece, p. 65/2. Adams , (thrice) Carlisle , mrs Lloyd , E F & T T call: T T dines: E F sleeps.
Sep. 2. Su. Greece, p. 67. Adams (twice) & Fks & H Boinville call: T T sups & sleeps .
3. M. Greece, p. 70/2. Adams calls: T T & E F sup.
4. Tu. Greece, p. 72. Adams , J Smith , T T & E F call: Wolcot at tea.
5. W. Greece, p. 75/2. Smiths , T T & Fk call n : dine at Aldis’s , w. Corry, Rees, Woodham & Hinckley .

6. Th.
M & Aldis call, & Fks : call on Tuthill
: Tuthill dines: Lamb sups. Call on
Carlisle
n .

7. F. Quixote, p. 76. Indisposed. Call on Hill
&
Curtis
: H Boinville , E Fk , Tuthil n & T T n call. Deliq. duo .

8. Sa. Quixote, p. 94. Call on Tuthill ; adv. L Ht
: meet T T , Flather & Voisy : H Robinson sups: Adams & J Stewart n call. Deliquium .

Sep. 9. Su.
Deliquium . Quixote, p. 117. Adams , Tuthil & Smiths call: T T sups.
10. M. Quixote, p. 161. H Boinville , E F & Adams call: T T sups.

11. Tu. Leicester, p. 178, fin. Baptist C H; Tabart, Phipps, Hurst & Kirkman : call on Letterman
: R Taylor calls.
12. W. Quixote, p. 244. Adams & Lamb call: theatre, 1/5 Wheel of Fortune: Patrickson calls: T T & Flather sups.

13. Th. Quixote, p. 260. Walk w. T T : T T dines, adv. Flather
.
14. F. Daniel, çala. Bond (on sir R Corbet ) calls, M (from Cooper ), & T T .

15. Sa. Amatonda, p. 60. Dine at Clapham, w. T T
: T T & P P sup. O’Hara calls.

Sep. 16. Su. Amatonda, p. 110, fin. Smith calls: dine at
H Boinville’s , w. M J & T T; adv. Voisy, Flather, Dawe & C C
.
17. M. Hornius, p. 21: Banks’s Cromwel, p. 95. T T calls: Smart dines: Lamb & M Burney sup.

18. Tu. Banks, p. 160. E F , M & Smart call: call on
Hume
,
Cherry
&
Patrickson
: T T at tea.

19. W. Greece, p. 77/2. Mrs Topping , Fks n & Patrickson : call on Tuthill
, &
Jo G
.

20. Th. Greece, p. 79. Call on R Taylor
: Stevenson calls: T T sups.

21. F. Greece, p. 81/2. Milton, çala. Call on Roufigny
: Patrickson & Girle call: mrs Topping dines; adv. T T & H Boinville
.
22. Sa. Greece, p. 85. Patrickson & mrs Clennel & J Davis call: T T sups.
Sep. 23. Su. Greece, p. 86. H Robinson sups. Peter Smith calls.
24. M. Greece, p. 88. Withers , Smith , M , Flather , & A Curran call, & Stevenson .

25. Tu. Greece, çala. Call on Northcote
: T T dines; adv. 2 E Fks, Hopwood & fille
.
26. W. Greece, çala. Stevenson calls.

27. Th. Write to J Smith & J Davis . Call on Ballachey
&
Jo G
n : Waldron & T T sup.

28. F. Preface to Poetry, 4 pp. Call on Tuthill
n : dine at St Paul’s, w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, White, Jas Moore; Belsham, Cogan & Jo. Johnson . Adams & T T call.
29. Sa. Greece, çala. Write to C C, 3 pp. T T sups.
Sep. 30. Su. Greece, çala. Plutarch, çala. Flather, 3 Fks & J Johnson dine.

Oct. 1. M. Greece, 2 pp. Plutarch, çala. Call on Tuthill , w. Patrickson :
Flather (ppc) & T T sup.

2. Tu. Rollin, Socrates.
Vauxhall, w. M J, M & W
: //
Lambs & P P sup. J Smith calls.

3. W. Call on Hume
&
Knowles
: T T & P P call.
4. Th. Hooker, p. 22. Hazlit & Patrickson call: sup at mrs Topping’s , w. M J .

5. F. Life of Hooker, pp. 100. Call on
Raine (adv. Watkinson ) &
Letterman
: meet Harris :
theatre, w. M J, Fontainebleau . M calls.

6. Sa. On Death, 6 pp. Hazlit dines; adv. T T & Patrickson
.
Oct. 7. Su. Hooker, p. 22. Dine at Hume’s , w. Colliers, Dawes & Hazlit .

8. M. Hooker, çala. Call on Watkinson
&
Manning
: T T sups.

9. Tu.
Haines (from Tabart ) & J Davis n call: Baptist’s Head; Phillips, Tabart, Hannam, Phipps, Hurst, Letterman, Lackington, Rivington & Espinasse : call on Tuthill
&
Longdill
: sup at Lamb’s , w. miss Wordsworth, Dawe, Hazlit & M J; adv. H Kn
.

10. W. Hooker, çala. Patrickson calls: call on Jo G
n .

11. Th. Call on T T
,
Faulder
,
J Smith
,
H Boinville (adv. T T ) &
Dawe ; adv. White, Wilson & Philip
: T T dines; adv. Patrickson
: J Smith sups: Jo G calls.

12. F. Write C M . Arcadia, p. 9-16. Call on Letterman
&
Hannam
n : Edwards (Oswestry) calls.
S Newton dies, aged 78 .

13. Sa. Arcadia, p. 25. Berry, fr, calls, & Faulder : Elgin’s, w. Newton, 2 Humes, De Berg, M J & C
: dine at Boinville’s , w. M J; adv. Newtons
: tea Smith’s
.

p.add: Recd of W Godwin, Aug. 15, 1809 five pounds £10 5. . . N Godwin H Godwin, 9, Castle Street, Houndsditch

div.ab: Oct. 14. Su. Warton, çala: La Cretelle, France, p. 103. Staveley calls.

15. M. Hall’s Satires, B. I. Call on Knowles
: meet Kemble : theatre, Ogleby, & Hit or Miss.
16. Tu. Hall, B. II. T T at tea: theatre, Heir at Law, & Bridal Ring. Staveley & Macmillan call

17. W.
Staveley & Miles (legacy) & Jo G call: call on
Lamb ; adv. mrs Lamb, mrs Reynolds & Phillips
.
18. Th. Arcadia, p. 30. Hume calls: 2 Newtons, 2 Boinvilles, Knowles, Hume, Voisy & Patrickson & H Hopwood at tea.
19. F. Arcadia, p. 35: Hall, B. III. Dine at St Paul’s , w. Fuseli, Bonnycastle, Knowles, Lockhart, Keene & Armiger .

20. Sa.
Patrickson , Tuthill & mrs Wyman call: T T sups. Spain, çala.

Oct 21. Su. Spain, çala. Fk at tea: Girle calls: call on Fk , for M J ; adv. Dawes
: J J dines.
22. M. Spain, çala. Write to Blackhall & mrs Napier. Wyman, Watkinson & T T call: H Robinson sups.

23. Tu.
J Smith at tea; adv. Voisy, Patrickson & T T
.

24. W. Write to C Mountcashel . Meet Courtenay , J Johnson & Britton : call on Hume
: N G calls: 2 Fks at tea.

25. Th. Arcadia, p. 40: Milton, Of Reformation, p. 16. Call on Hume
: A Curran & T T call: T T sups. J Johnson calls.

26. F. Write to Wedgwood & Rogers . Call on Cooper, bb
: E Topping & E C Smith dine; adv. T T
: Dawe sups. Wordsworth, p. 24.

27. Sa. Arcadia, p. 48. Newton calls:
theatre, K. John, & Tom Thumb, w. M J, F, M, J & C
.
Phillips bankrupt

Oct. 28. Su. Write to E Topping . Arcadia, p. 66. Patrickson calls: sup at Collier’s , w. Lambs, Bakewel, Tomlins, H Robinson, M J, M & J .
W Godwin married

29. M. Arcadia, p. 80. Call on Montagu
: Patrickson calls: call on H Robinson
n . (forerunner Coleridge.)

30. Tu. Arcadia, p. 89. Call on Knowles
: A Curran, Wolcot & T T dine; adv. Voisy
: sup at Montagu’s , w. Patrickson . Write to Upham & Booth .

31. W. Arcadia, p. 99. Jo G calls: call on
Montagu ; adv. Edw. Smith
: tea Dawe’s , w. Newtons, 3 Boinvilles, Northcote, A Curran, Voisy, T T & M J .

Nov. 1. Th. Arcadia, p. 109. Patrickson , Macmillan & Staveley call: call on
H Robinson
n &
M Lamb
: Staveley sups. Parliament meets: adjourns to 15.

2. F. Arcadia, p. 130. Call on Hurst & Orme
,
Crosby
, &
Watkinson
: H Robinson calls, & T T .
Princess Amelia dies .

3. Sa. Arcadia, p. 147. Call on Law
: Patrickson sups. Adams calls.

Nov. 4. Su. Arcadia, p. 180. J Smith calls: call on Fenwick
: Girle at tea. N G calls.
5. M. Write to P H G , Withers & mrs Taylor : mrs Wyman calls: Smith at tea: T T sups.

6. Tu. Call on Raine
: Berry , Montagu & Coleridge call: dine at Ward’s , w. Coleridge, Swan & Middleton . J Davis calls na .

7. W. Arcadia, p. 194. Patrickson & T T call: call on
Hume
.

8. Th. Arcadia, p. 201: Burton, p. 16. Sup at Lb’s
.

9. F. Burton, p. 30. Call on Montagu
, & w. him, on Tuthil
: T T & Patrickson sup.

10. Sa. Write to Sheppard , Baker , Saffory , & Marchl
. Arcadia, p. 209: Plague, p. 132. Call on Ballachy
.

Nov. 11. Su. Arcadia, p. 225: Plague, p. 200. Cooper , T T & Smith call: tea
Collier’s , w. Hardy, Miller & Le Maitre
.
12. M. Arcadia, p. 251: Plague, p. 343. T T sups.

13. Tu. Arcadia, p. 287: Plague, p. 360. A Curran , Patrickson , Readwin & Steed call: call on Hume
.

14. W. Arcadia, p. 299: Plague, p. 376, fin. Dine at H Boinville’s , w. Rontgen, Newton, T T & M J & F; adv. Cornelia Newton & Dawe
. Burton, p. 40.

15. Th. Arcadia, p. 313. Seek Creed : dine at Cooper’s , w. Incledon, Bellamy, Matthews, Fawcet, Swartwout, Irving; adv. Powel
: N G calls. Parliament adjourns to 29.

16. F.
Faulder & Patrickson call: call on Creed
,
Liston
&
Montagu ; adv. Tuthill & Betham
: T T sups.

17. Sa. Write to Blackall & L Ht . Call on Watkinson
: T T at tea: N G calls: call on
Miles
n; adv. Hollis
.

Nov. 18. Su. Burton, p. 72, fin. Pref. Coleridge, Northcote, 2 Dawes, 3 Fenwicks, H Robinson & T T dine; adv. Voisy
.

19. M. Write to Blackall . Coleridge breakfasts:
Baker (Southampton)
& J Smith call: tea
Newton’s , w. Gacons & Whitelocke .

20. Tu. Burton, p. 22: Shadwel, L Witches, acts 1 & 2. Call on Montagu
na .

21. W. Call on Theobald
&
Cooper
n : T T, Voisy & Patrickson sup.
22. Th. Shadwel, L W, fin. Meet Jo G : Cooper calls.

23. F. Call on Vaughan
,
Tipper
,
Cooper
,
S S H
, &
Ward
: T T & Patrickson call: call on Adams , w. M J . Jo G calls: call on
Macmillan
.

24. Sa.
Adams calls: call on Bousfield
,
R Taylor
&
Montagu
.

Nov. 25. Su. Arcadia, p. 330. Dine at Hume’s , w. C C : call at Montagu ; adv. Tuthills
: T T calls.

26. M. Write to Blackall . Call on Raine
: Faulder & Liston call:
Patrickson (ppc) , T T & Voisy dine.

27. Tu. Write to Arnot . Call on Gillet
&
Bousfield
: Newton & mrs Fenwick call, & Macmillan n .

28. W. Campaspe, acts 1, 2, 3. T T & E Fk call: dine at
Cooper’s , w. M, Kendal & Irving .

29. Th. Campaspe, acts 4, 5. Call on Creed
,
Hume
,
Swartwout (adv. Irving ),
Cumberland
&
O’Hara
: sup at Hollis’s ; adv. Lister
. Parliament adjourns to Dec. 13.
30. F. Regency, 1 1/2 pp. Hollis & T T call.
Dec. 1. Sa. Write to J Taylor , Booth & Berry . Newtons & Boinvilles call: Rontgen, T T & Voisy sup.

Dec. 2. Su. Write to Withers & Faulder . Cumberland, Cooper, Listons, Humes & 2 E Fks dine; invités, Mathews & Swartwout ; adv. Fairly na
.

3. M. Call on Lewis
: J Davis & T T call: Fairly sups.
4. Tu. Euphues, p. 32: Arcadia, p. 356. B Montagu calls.
5. W. Write to Meyler , Barrat , Brodie , Merridew & Deck . Arcadia, p. 366: Osborn, çala. Letter from J Taylor .

6. Th. Arcadia, p. 400. Call on Theobald
: T T & E Fk call: theatre, Spoiled Child; adv. Cooper, Dawe & J Taylor
.

7. F. Call on Montagu
,
Creed
&
M Lamb
: Miles & J Davis call: Rontgen & T T dine; adv. Northcote & Dawe
.
8. Sa. Langbaine & Rymer, çala. Write to Savage . meet Phillips .
Dec. 9. Su. Arcadia, p. 426, fin: Euphues, p. 55. Fairly dines.
10. M. Euphues, p. 70. Write to Baker .

11. Tu. Call on Knowles (adv. Miles & adm. Bligh ) &
Hume
:
theatre, w. M J, Isabella & X Y Z; adv. T T, Rontgen , & 2 Boinvilles
. mrs Wyman calls.
12. W. London Prodigal. Rontgen & T T call: Fairly dines.

13. Th. Write to Sands . Malone’s Dryden, çala. T T sups; adv. H Hopwood
: Smirke calls.

14. F. Call on Adams
,
Lambert (adv. Hawkes ) &
Rodd
: dine at St Paul’s , w. Fuseli, Northcote, Davy, Bonnycastle, Hewlet, White, Knowles, Cooper, Knighton, capt. Hunter & Reid : Fairly sups.
Smith calls .
15. Sa. Hind & Panther, B. I: Scott’s Dryden, çala. Withers calls.
Dec. 16. Su. Hind & Panther, B. III: Rymer on Tragedy, p. 55. Fairly dines.

17. M. Hind & Panther, B. II. Call on
Knowles
&
Waldron
: mrs Fenwick calls: H Boinville dines: T T sups. (adv. sir James Yeo. )
18. Tu. Write to Patrickson & Arnot . Rymer, p. 131: Rosader, p. 18. Tabart calls.

19. W. Rymer, p. 249. Call on Creed
: Fairly calls: E F sups.

20. Th. Write to Gillet & Booth . Rymer, 324, fin. Sup at
Lamb’s
: H Robinson sups n . Regency by Bill, 269 to 157.

21. F.
Wardmote, St Bride’s ; adv. Quin, Middleton, Morgan, Richter (Murrel, Curtis, Seabrook, Thomson, Waithman) : J F & A Newton, & A Boinville dine: Astley’s, w. do & six : T T , H R , Pattersons , Voisy & Fairly call.

22. Sa. Call on Lambs
,
Chamberlaine
,
J Robinson
na ,
Jo G
n ,
White
,
Ralph
&
Rodd
: Lewis calls
Dec. 23. Su. Brooke’s Sidney, p. 44. T T , Flather & Fairly call.

24. M. Write to Fairly, on Morison
. Call on Ward
n ,
Wardmote
,
Knowles
,
Smirke
&
Lambert
: T T at tea: Fairly calls.

25. Tu.
Fairly (ppc) , N G & T T call: dine at
Hume’s , w. M J, mrs Thomson, B Mercier & capt. Kemp .

26. W. Tacitus, çala. Call on mrs Boaden
. Brooke, p. 105.

27. Th. Ignatius’s Conclave. Call, w. T T, on Watson
: dine at Cooper’s , w. Mathews, Liston, M, Hamilton, Crowser, Robjot & Gratz; adv. Powel
.

28. F. Call on Place
&
J Taylor ; adv. T Smith & Kemble
: meet Perry : T T, Flather & Voisy dine.

29. Sa. Write to Malone . Seek Horwood & Towgood : call on Curtis
, &
Wilson, bookseller
: theatre, Harlequin & Asmodeus.

Dec. 30. Su. L Brooke, B. I. Call on A Robinson, Camberwel , w. M J C C : Adams’s, Colliers, H Robinson, Henry, Smith, Wolcot & Bakewel dine; invités Ward, Tipper & White, & Eastwk , & Smiths
. meet Hill , Hayward , Hodgkins , & Frend
.

31. M. Write to Tuthill . Call on Tuthill
: meet B Montagu : T T sups. Restrictions, 224 to 200—Peerage, 226 to 210—Patent Places & Pensions, 233 to 214.
